00018 ListManager::ListManager(const QString title, QWidget *parent,
00019                                                  const QStringList& items): 
00020 QGroupBox(title, parent), model_(this, items), view_(this) {
00021         view_.setMovement(QListView::Free);
00022 
00023         // create the layout for the right side buttons
00024         QVBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00025 
00026         // create the buttons
00027         QPushButton* addButton = new QPushButton(tr("Add new"), this);
00028         buttonLayout->addWidget(addButton);
00029         connect(addButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00030                 this, SLOT(onAdd()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031 
00032         QPushButton* editButton = new QPushButton(tr("Edit"), this);
00033         buttonLayout->addWidget(editButton);
00034         connect(editButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00035                 this, SLOT(onEdit()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00036 
00037         QPushButton* removeButton = new QPushButton(tr("Remove"), this);
00038         buttonLayout->addWidget(removeButton);
00039         connect(removeButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00040                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00041 
00042         QPushButton* moveUpButton = new QPushButton(tr("Move up"), this);
00043         buttonLayout->addWidget(moveUpButton);
00044         connect(moveUpButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00045                 this, SLOT(onMoveUp()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00046 
00047         QPushButton* moveDownButton = new QPushButton(tr("Move Down"), this);
00048         buttonLayout->addWidget(moveDownButton);
00049         connect(moveDownButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00050                 this, SLOT(onMoveDown()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051 
00052         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00053 
00054         // the top layout of the widget
00055         QHBoxLayout* topLayout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00056 
00057         // add the view on the left side
00058         topLayout->addWidget(&view_);
00059 
00060         // and all the buttons on the right side
00061         topLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00062 
00063         // connect the model to the view
00064         view_.setModel(&model_);
00065 
00066 }

00072 void ListManager::onAdd() {
00073         QString item = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Add a new item to list"), 
00074                 tr("Input the text for the item to add"));
00075 
00076         // if user wrote an empty string or if clicked cancel
00077         if (item.isEmpty()) {
00078                 return;
00079         }
00080 
00081         model_.appendItem(item);
00082 
00083         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00084         emit contentChanged();
00085         return;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void ListManager::onEdit() {
00089         
00090         // ask the view for the selected index
00091         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00092 
00093         // if index was invalid (nothing was chosen)
00094         if (!index.isValid()) {
00095                 return;
00096         }
00097 
00098         // get the old text that is currently stored in the model
00099         QString oldText = model_.data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00100 
00101         // ask the user to set the new text
00102         QString newText = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Edit an item in the list"),
00103                 tr("Input the new value for the item"), QLineEdit::Normal, 
00104                 oldText);
00105 
00106         // if empty string was given or cancel was pressed
00107         if (newText.isEmpty()) {
00108                 return;
00109         }
00110 
00111         // if user changed the text
00112         else if (oldText != newText) {
00113                 model_.replace(index, newText);
00114 
00115                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00116                 emit contentChanged();
00117         }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void ListManager::onRemove() {
00121         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00122         model_.remove(index);
00123 
00124         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00125         emit contentChanged();
00126 }
00127 
00128 void ListManager::onMoveUp() {
00129         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00130         model_.moveUp(index);
00131 
00132         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00133         emit contentChanged();
00134 }
00135 
00136 void ListManager::onMoveDown() {
00137         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00138         model_.moveDown(index);
00139 
00140         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00141         emit contentChanged();
00142 }

00144 const QStringList& ListManager::items() const {
00145         return model_.items();

00148 void ListManager::setItems( const QStringList& items ) {
00149         model_.setItems(items);

00152 int ListManager::size() const {
00153         return model_.rowCount(QModelIndex());
